items.name: Barleypop
items.desc:
Barleypop / Lite Lager / 4 x 440ml / 4.4% ABV
Suitable for vegans.
POP-POP! Barleypop is our new 4.4% Lite Lager. Putting some polish on the well-worn everyday light lager, this is an extremely sunny beer designed for drinking with grass between your toes.
One 4-pack leaves 20 can slots left in your case!

items.name: Blankets
items.desc:
Blankets / Pale Ale / 4 x 440ml / 4.5% ABV
Suitable for vegans.
Blankets is the newest soft and fluffy creation from the Pale Ale department. Citra, Columbus and Cascade in sheer suppable balance. Pure, silky comfort.
One 4-pack leaves 20 can slots left in your case!

items.name: Buckle Down
items.desc:
Buckle Down / DDH Pale Ale / 4 x 440ml / 5.0% ABV
Suitable for vegans.
A DDH Pale Ale dry hopped with Citra, Amarillo and Columbus. Flexing fruity sherbet and superfresh dankness above its 5% ABV. Keep on keeping on with this juicy treat.
One 4-pack leaves 20 can slots left in your case!

items.name: Curiosity Vendor
items.desc:
Curiosity Vendor / DDH Pale Ale / 4 x 440ml / 6.0% ABV
Suitable for vegans.
Curiosity Vendor is a new DDH Pale hopped with Citra, Chinook and Topaz. Bursting with citrus and passionfruit, this hazy pale has a super-soft, full-bodied texture.
One 4-pack leaves 20 can slots left in your case!

items.name: Drag Race Johnny
items.desc:
Drag Race Johnny / NEIPA / 4 x 440ml / 6.7% ABV
Suitable for vegans.
Drag Race Johnny is a NEIPA that rides the racing line between sticky stonefruit and pithy bitterness. Azacca, Citra, Simcoe and no brakes.
One 4-pack leaves 20 can slots left in your case!

items.name: Flashpoint
items.desc:
Flashpoint / NEIPA / 4 x 440ml / 6.2% ABV
Suitable for vegans.
Showcasing Citra alongside some Aussie pals Topaz and Enigma, Flashpoint is a full-bodied New England IPA with a hop character far in excess of its 6.2% ABV. Peach and pineapple notes are balanced by snappy dankness.
One 4-pack leaves 20 can slots left in your case!

items.name: Free Fall
items.desc:
Free Fall / NEIPA / 4 x 440ml / 7.3% ABV
Suitable for vegans.
Free Fall is a brand new 7.3% NEIPA using Mosaic, Citra and Idaho 7. Expect lots of mango and tropical vibes in this soft and super-balanced IPA!
One 4-pack leaves 20 can slots left in your case!

items.name: Grisette
items.desc:
Grisette / Farmhouse Pale / 4 x 440ml / 4.4% ABV
Suitable for vegans.
Grisette is our light, floral and citrusy Farmhouse Pale at 4.4% ABV. This is your ideal companion for working-in-the-sun (or just drinking-in-the-sun).
One 4-pack leaves 20 can slots left in your case!

items.name: House IPA
items.desc:
House IPA / India Pale Ale / 4 x 440ml / 6.9% ABV
Suitable for vegans.
House IPA is a New England IPA with a light and fluffy body, delicate carbonation, and a big-hitting dry-hop combo of Mosaic and Motueka. Aromas of mango and pineapple. More tropical fruit on the tongue. Super drinkable and very moreish.
One 4-pack leaves 20 can slots left in your case!

items.name: NEW 12 Beer Mega Pack
items.desc:
NEW 12 Beer Mega Pack 24 x 440ml
Loads of new beers straight off the canning line and some fresh, firm favourites. Each case of 24 cans will consist of 12 different beers, in quantities subject to availability. Cases cannot be customised. All the beer is superfresh! Beers included*:
CURIOSITY VENDOR – DDH PALE ALE (CITRA CHINOOK TOPAZ) – 6.0% ABV
GRISETTE – FARMHOUSE PALE ALE – 4.4% ABV
BUCKLE DOWN – DDH PALE ALE (CITRA AMARILLO COLUMBUS) – 5.0% ABV
DRAG RACE JOHNNY – NEIPA (AZACCA CITRA SIMCOE) – 6.7% ABV
WIND AND SEA SURF CLUB – PALE ALE (AZACCA SIMCOE) – 4.5% ABV
FLASHPOINT – NEIPA (CITRA TOPAZ ENIGMA) – 6.2% ABV
PUSH PUSH – DDH PALE (CITRA AZACCA SABRO) – 5.8% ABV
BLANKETS – PALE ALE (CITRA COLUMBUS CASCADE) – 4.2% ABV
POCKET ROCKET – TINY IPA (CITRA SIMCOE IDAHO 7) – 2.7% ABV
HOUSE IPA – INDIA PALE ALE – 6.9% ABV
PACKETS – KELLER LAGER – 4.2% ABV
PASSIONFRUIT GOSE – FRUIT SOUR – 4.5% ABV
*Subject to availability. Beers may be swapped for new releases if out of stock.

items.name: Packets
items.desc:
Packets / Keller Lager / 4 x 440ml / 4.2% ABV
Suitable for vegans.
Packets Keller Lager is a new naturtrüb crispy boy with that Keller Instinct: soft in body; full, bready, fresh flavours; and a quenching, moreish mouthfeel. Thirsty just thinking about it.
One 4-pack leaves 20 can slots left in your case!

items.name: Passionfruit Gose
items.desc:
Passionfruit Gose / Fruit Sour / 4 x 440ml / 4.5% ABV
Suitable for vegans.
Tangy, tropical, tart and tasty. A light and snappy Gose-style sour beer, infused with passionfruit.
One 4-pack leaves 20 can slots left in your case!

items.name: Pocket Rocket
items.desc:
Pocket Rocket / Tiny IPA / 4 x 440ml / 2.7% ABV
Suitable for vegans.
Pocket Rocket is our latest low-ABV bangerang: a 2.7% Tiny IPA. Citra, Simcoe and Idaho 7 are packed in tight in this agile little juice machine. Fruit salad vibes with moreish bitterness.
One 4-pack leaves 20 can slots left in your case!

items.name: Push Push
items.desc:
Push Push / DDH Pale Ale / 4 x 440ml / 5.8% ABV
Suitable for vegans.
Switch off the grey skies. Switch on Citra, Azacca and Sabro for a tropical cocktail of silky pineapple and passionfruit flavours. This is a DDH Pale Ale firing on all cylinders. Push it!
One 4-pack leaves 20 can slots left in your case!
